alert.note: Alert for Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN SHELBY, WESTERN CHAMPAIGN, WESTERN LOGAN, NORTHWESTERN CLARK AND EASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Piqua to near Huber Heights, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Huber Heights, Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Tipp City, New Carlisle, St. Paris, Brown, Hardin, Quincy, Christiansburg, North Hampton, Fletcher, Tremont City, Port Jefferson, Donnelsville, Casstown, Lockington and Thackery. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 75 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
